metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3523 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel. It has been classified asproblematic. Affected is an unknown function of the file mm/memory.c of thecomponent Driver Handler. The manipulation leads to use after free. It ispossible to launch the attack remotely. It is recommended to apply a patchto fix this issue. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-211020.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
